alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook and eastern Lake Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles north of Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake, to 6 miles southeast of Little Marais, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tofte around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lutsen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
